header.title: Browser-based PDF form fields detection
header.subtitle: Automatically detect form fields in PDFs with CommonForms using ONNX Runtime Web
header.aboutCommonFormsDescription: <0>CommonForms</0> by <1>Joe Barrow</1> uses FFDNet models trained on a large dataset of forms to automatically detect text boxes, checkboxes, and signature fields in PDF documents.
header.howItWorksBullet2: Detect and add the relevant PDF acrofields
header.howItWorksBullet4: Fill or download or the resulting PDF

statusMessages.runningDetection: Running form field detection using {{modelName}} model...

errors.invalidPdfFile: Please select a valid PDF file
errors.pdfEncryptedOrMalformed: This PDF is either password-protected or malformed. If not password protected, try converting it to PDF/A first at
errors.pdfEncryptedNotAffiliated: (we are not affiliated with this service).
errors.pdfProcessingFailed: Unknown error when processing the PDF: {{errorMessage}}

warnings.pdfHasAcrofields: This PDF already contains {{count}} fillable field. If you proceed, these will be replaced with the newly detected fields.
warnings.pdfHasAcrofields_other: This PDF already contains {{count}} fillable fields. If you proceed, these will be replaced with the newly detected fields.
